name: Klements Attack
description:
Klements Attack is a Shoot’em Up Arcade game created with a sense of nostalgia for the great Classics of the Golden Age of Arcades.

Help the heroine Juls to defend Earth against the terrible threat from the planet Klement.

Klements Attack was developed in a one-month challenge at the Apple Developer Academy of the Catholic University of Brasilia - UCB.

Developer team:
Daniel Lima
Ítalo Sjobom
Juliana Furtado (Juls)
João Vitor
Matheus Clemente (Emperor Klement 43º)
